input.select_file: Select a file or drag and drop here
input.general_comments_info: Is common for our clients to book in a restaurant, providing tous the restaurant name and the meal appointment can help our captain to adjust and adapt the route of your sail
input.toy_stand_up_paddle_info: Click here to see the video of the SUP
input.toy_seabob_info: Click chere to see a video of the SEABOB
input.i_agree_with_the_privacy_policy: I agree with the privacy policy
input.guarantee_label: I guarantee that the information of the user is from a user that is going to go to the boat.
input.file_sizes: JPG, PNG or PDF, file size no more than 10MB
input.boat_passenger_info1: This boat allows a maximum of
input.boat_passenger_info2: passengers. We require to know this information to prepare the lifevest and other equipment accordingly
input.continue_without_prepayment: I want to continue without prepayment
input.complete_field: Complete all fields to sign the contract
input.recommendation_text: If the rating for the client is high (3 starts or more), send him a recommendation requests.

prepayment_modal.prepayment_fuel_modal_p1: By prepaying the fuel you will ensure that you will avoid unforeseen expenses and be clear about the total payment. The captain will adapt to a maximum consumption according to the weather conditions and allowing you to have a relaxed day without having to waste time making payments at the end of the day.

feedback.rate_required: Give a revision from 1 to 5 stars

sidebar.we_are_excited_to_help_you_plan_your_nex: We are excited to help you plan your next water adventure.
sidebar.sidebar_p1: Please take a moment to provide us with some essential details, so we can ensure you have a smooth and enjoyable experience.
sidebar.sidebar_p2: Your responses will help us schedule your boat reservation and cater to your specific needs. Thank you for choosing us for your boating adventure!
sidebar.feedback_sidebar: Collecting this information is really important for our company. We can improve our service and cost enhancing the experience fo both client and staff.
sidebar.fuel_sidebar: Collecting this information is really important for our company. We can improve our service and cost enhancing the experience fo both client and staff.
